Name: Mary
Phrase: God damn it, Ricardo, you've got a lot of nerve to demand people to be sharp and then be late yourself. You're certainly living up to your inherited title of 'The Divine Child of Trust.'

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Not really I guess, inheriting isn't quite accurate. No other Divine Child has a lifestyle as mischievous and unpredictable as her.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Eh, I suppose I'm the same way when I put it like that.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Mary! I'm sorry I'm late.

Name: Mary
Phrase: You're really late... Umm, who's the girl next to you?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: 'Heheh, it's a surprise from me♪ She's our new friend...♪

Name: Mary
Phrase: Who's our new friend...?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Let me introduce you - Yuuzen, the Nishikese sorceress!

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: I'm Yuuzen. Nice to meetcha.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Mary Rosegarden.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Mary Rosegarden? Why is the Knight Commander of the Order of St. Iris here...

Name: Mary
Phrase: I left the Order for, reasons. Just pretend that I disappeared into the Mist.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: 'Hey, hey, Mary, listen! This girl is a descendant of the living doll master Yuuzen the First!

Name: Mary
Phrase: The living doll master Yuuzen the FIrst... nope, doesn't ring a bell. I'm sorry, but I don't know much about Nishiki. I'd appreciate it if you could tell me a few things along the way.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: I don't have much to tell ya. Even among Nishiki folks, only a few doll enthusiasts know the name. If I tell them I'm a descendant of Yuuzen, they'll think I'm an impostor, there's no evidence to back it up...

Name: Mary
Phrase: What are you talking about? Neither Ricardo nor I consider you a fraud.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Yep. I invited you because you are a good sorceress. I need your help with that power of yours.

Name: Mary
Phrase: And you don't have to hide the magic of the dolls in your basket. Both me and Ricardo have long since found out.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: No, no. These children are really just regular dolls. They just have a bit of a pitiful curse on them, but they won't harm anyone.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I know what they are. If I can't even see through that much, I can't be a Knight Commander.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: 'Likewise! If I can't see through that, I can't be a Divine Child of Trust~♪

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Do ya both trust me...?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Of course I do. I believe in you.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Even if you are a fraud, I'm touched when you went back into the Phantom Mist to rescue even just one doll.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Did that happen?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: She helped to evacuate the inhabitants in Nishiki, and then there was a girl who said she had left her doll at home. Yuuzen went back alone to get the doll.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: The girl who owned the doll will cherish it for the rest of her life, and she will never forget the face of the benefactor who saved her family.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: I'm not fighting to ingratiate myself, I don't care what anyone thinks of me.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Mhm, I knew you were the right girl♪

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: What did ya mean by that?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: I want people in my group who are willing to risk his or her life to achieve a goal, not for reward or honour. When we are dealing with the Phantom Mist, we cannot afford to have any doubts.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: What we do from now on will probably not be appreciated by anyone. As long as we have made the decision not to move the Mist Train, neither the Alliance nor the Knights will be on our side.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Yet we still want to save this world. We want to save this wonderful world of Iris Cloud. I want to make it possible for people to come and go freely. To do this, we must learn about the Giant Tree.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Not only will we risk our lives, it could also tarnish our family name. They might even point the finger at us as the bad guys.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: But I still want a friend who is willing to fight for peace, that's why I chose you, Yuuzen.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: What exactly do ya want me to do?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Find a way to get closer to the Giant Tree! To do that, we'll travel around the world and gather as much information as we can!

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Sounds fun, doesn't it?♪

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Bleh, of course it won't be fun...

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: ... but it does sound interesting.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Right!?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: It will be a tough journey, but I think it will be worthwhile. I'm sure there are things we need to do before we can get the Mist Train going.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Hopefully we can work it out without using the Mist Train, but the higher ups are dying to use that new weapon of yours.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: It's not a weapon, it's a Train of Dreams...

Name: Mary
Phrase: One day they'll call it that. Your son will connect our thoughts.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Ya've got a kid!!??

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes she does. She put the poor boy danger more than once because she carries him around everywhere.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: 'That's how I educate my boy! You're still a young child, Mary, you won't understand right now.

Name: Yuuzen
Phrase: Ya're going to leave your family to do a dangerous job, is that it? What will happen to the child if ya expire?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: It's out of your hands. He will go his own way. Don't underestimate my son.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Even without his mother, that boy will not waver. One day, he will be a hero who saves Iris Cloud and will be a good man who the whole world will look up to.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Ricardo, time is up.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Yes... we have to go now.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: ...Hey Mary?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Thank you. I am grateful to you, for believing in me.

After a fierce battle, the Special Steel Squad defeated Ricardo, who was Poisoned and turned into a Monster. Ricardo's body, which had acted as a receptacle for the poison in place of the Giant Tree, was detached from the Giant Tree. We managed to prevent the Poison from flowing into St. Iris.
Mary also fought well. When the other Train Knights saw Ricardo weakening, their resolve wavered with a sense of guilt. Mary was the only one who continued to wield her sword without hesitation,
even after Ricardo had completely stopped moving, Mary did not sheathe her sword.
She was still in combat stance anticipating for attacks, serving as our shield, even after Ricardo was freed from the Giant Tree and collapsed on the tracks, she never left Ricardo's side.
This is the difference in experience. This is the serious fighting style of someone who has seen a lot of Hell.
Perhaps both Mary and Ricardo had even both turned their swords on their own allies and dealt the finishing blow to them. It would not be surprising to have cases where a friend kills another.

This is the battle against the Phantom Mist. This is the battle with the Giant Tree. This is the battle of those who have continued to face head-on the source of what had tormented, hurt and plagued the people of Iris Cloud.

After defeating Ricardo, the Guardian's Chamber showed Mary and her friends as youngsters. During this time, Mary remained in a fighting stance and did not take her eyes off Ricardo for a single moment.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Was that just now Lady Ricardo's memory...?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: There was Yuuzen and Mary, I wonder if this was a memory of when Yuuzen became Ricardo's companion.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yuuzen, she was quite a nice person.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: ...Mary, finish me quickly.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: If you don't kill me, the Poison willl go to someone else. If my son is next, it'll be unstoppable this time.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Please. Do your duty.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Alright, I'll escort you to the ends of the earth.
Wait, Mary. That's not necessary.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Conductor, I'm sorry, but Ricardo is right. We have to mercy kill Ricardo while she still contained the Poison in her. Otherwise, either Ricardo or the conductor will be become a vicious Monster with a Giant Tree as its stronghold.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Whoever that is will be the worst source of the Poison.
I know. We must put Ricardo down, together with the Poison.
But that is not Mary's role. That role should be mine, as a Divine Child, as the Conductor of the Special Steel Squad.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Conductor...

I'm doing doing this as a duty of a son. Killing Ricardo, who has been poisoned, means sealing off the source of the powerful Mist that infects this Giant Tree. In that case, the most effective way to finish her off is with the power of a Divine Child.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: The boy has a point. Mary, I apologize, but let him do the honours.

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...Are you okay with that?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Good. All good.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: When I decided to stay here, I was prepared to stay here forever. But now I can say goodbye to my favourite friend and my beloved son. I can also see my son fulfilling his duties as a Divine Child, now that he has grown up. I have no regrets, it's the most beautiful ending I could have hoped for.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I understand. It's my duty to fulfil your wishes.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Hey, Ricardo.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Yes, Mary?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Have I fulfilled my duties as a knight?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Even though I wasn't with you, have I done what I needed to do?

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Yes, you did a great job. You may not know this, but I watched everything...

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: You've ended one big battle. There were many times when I thought it was all over, but... you managed it all.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: And now a new battle is about to begin. Protect my son, Mary, it's your duty as a knight.

Name: Mary
Phrase: A new battle...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Hahah- what a bother, you're the same rowdy Divine Child as always.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Take care of my son for me, Mary.
--We don't have much time for pleasantries anymore.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Please excuse me. I thought I should at least thank her for her hospitality.
Ricardo... my mother.
As your son, I'm sorry it had to end this way. But I am proud of my mother, I wanted to tell you this.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: I, too, am proud of you.
Ricardo Trevithick's achievements in this world are great, you designed the Mist Train and fought against the Phantom Mist as the Divine Child of Trust.
But it is not for these reasons that I am proud of you, mother.
You did not turn away from the truth. You thought about what she had to do to protect Iris Cloud, to save people. You thought about what you had to do, and you showed it in action.
I salute you from the bottom of my heart. I will tell many people about what you did, mother. A woman and her friends who protected peace and iridescent clouds.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Thank you. I'm happy I built the Mist Train.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: What is that train called now by the people of Iris Cloud?
--The Train of Dreams.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: I see. Thank you, everyone.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: I have no regrets. I am the happiest Divine Child of St. Iris.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Goodbye. Take care of Mary. Take care of your friends above all else.
Oh, and I'll make sure I look after my sister too. Dr. Gloria was very worried about you too.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: I'm sorry for all the trouble I caused her. I hope you love her a lot, even more than I do.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Conductor, Ricardo's magic will run out soon. It's now or never.
...Understood.
Next, we will defeat the monsters that haunt the Giant Tree of St. Iris, and seal the root source of the Poison that calls forth the objects of the otherworlds.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: This tremendous power... I sense a power stronger than Lady Islington's offensive magic.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If Yoshino and the others were here, we might get caught in the blast.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: All hands stand by! We'll board the Mist Train and prepare for an emergency escape!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Roger!
The Train Knights may have sensed my magical reaction. They quickly return to the Mist Train.
My subordinates are excellent. This is also the first time today that I have used the powers of a Divine Child. It's hard to even say that I can control it completely.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Queensway has grown up too. I thought she was going to say she wants to stay here with me...
This means she has faith in you, Mary. She knows Mary can handle it on her own, so she has taken action to do the best she can.

Name: Mary
Phrase: My duty is to assist the Divine Children. I'll make sure you're protected. Make sure you finish her. Don't go easy.
Of course I'm going to take it seriously. This is my first big job.
As the heir to the power of Ricardo Trevithick, as a child of the Country of Peace and Iridescent Clouds,
As the commander of the SSS -- it is my duty as the Conductor.

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: The Giant Tree of St Iris in the Land of Peace and Iridescent Clouds will be purified. But don't forget... there are four more Giant Trees.\nThere are also four more Guardians to save...

Name: Ricardo
Phrase: Farewell. My loved ones.
And so, the Guardian of the Giant Tree completed its task, absorbed by the Giant Tree of St. Iris.
Ricardo Trevithick's life came to an end, who fought to absorb large quantities of the Poison that flowed from the otherworlds to save the Giant Tree of St. Iris.
She was smiling in her last moments.
She looked towards the Train of Dreams and waved to everyone,
As if to say, "Have a good journey".

Name: Mary
Phrase: Conductor, we're going back to the Mist Train now. After all that strong magic, anything can happen.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary, Conductor sir, hurry! There are a lot of Samanthas pouring in from down there!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Prepare to depart! Vivienne and Yoshino, prepare to intercept! Paddington, what's the status of the furnace?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: No problem! If Conductor injects some magic power, the train will be able to run as normal.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It doesn't even have to function normally. The rails are glowing red, just like when we came up.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Good! Luck is on our side! Now we can get all the way back to the gate at once! Mary, Conductor, get on board alright!?

Name: Mary
Phrase: It's alright. Let's start the train.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Here we go then. Mist Train, full speed ahead!
The Mist Train ran at full speed through the interior of the Giant Tree and passed through the gate leading to the Sea of Fog, with a great many Samantha surrounding us.

Unlike the outward journey, the return journey was a straight road. We weren't stopped at every station. There were no trials, no Samantha's appearance, etc. directly heading towards the first station where Islington was waiting for us.
On the way, an astonishing sight met our eyes.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Everyone, look outside!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Outside?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: 'The Mist is... cleared?'

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The Sea of Fog in St. Iris is gone! Conductor sir and Lady Ricardo have really cleared the Mist!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: 'Wow... was this really the Sea of Fog?'

Name: Putra
Phrase: What a beautiful sight. This place was called the Sea of Fog for hundreds of years!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Unbelievable. I didn't know that the area around the Giant Tree was so beautiful.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: There are beautiful forests and flower gardens that go on forever. It's like a paradise.

Name: Mary
Phrase: This is the country Ricardo loved. This is St. Iris, the country of Peace and Iridescent Clouds.

Name: Mary
Phrase: This is the world we must protect.

The continent of Iris Cloud is shrouded in deep Mist - The Mist spreads across the world from around the Giant Tree that towers over the borders of each country, vicious demons called Mist Monsters dwelled in the Mist, bewitched people and attacked them.
People called the abominable mist - the Phantom Mist.
Where does the Phantom Mist come from? How long has it covered this world?
There was a legendary Divine Child who got to the bottom of the matter before anyone else,
Her name is Ricardo Trevithick. She was a divine child who received the blessing of the goddess St. Iris, the hero of the Iris Cloud, who has upheld the spirit of justice and defended the world.

-The Mist and the railway are closely related. Go around the stations hidden in the Mist and release the Guardians who sleep in the five Giant Trees. Let the iridescent clouds strengthen and become a light that clears the Mist.
Ricardo is the only Guardian of the Giant Tree we have released.
We just saved the Giant Tree of St. Iris. Does it not mean that we have saved Iris Cloud...?
